data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Banas Kantha, Gujarat, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Banas Kantha, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Banas Kantha to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Banas Kantha.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Banas Kantha, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Sathwara people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 3,048,312, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Banas Kantha, Gujarat, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Banas Kantha who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Banas Kantha
location.people_groups_list: Dadhi (Muslim traditions), Garmatang, Shenva (Hindu traditions), Khalpa, Brahmin Tapodhan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dadhi (Muslim traditions) (2,300), Garmatang (400), Shenva (Hindu traditions) (118,000), Khalpa (118,000), Brahmin Tapodhan (30,000)
